name: web-pdm-doc
description: 一个用G6做的ER图工具，最终目标是想做成在线版的 powerdesigner

scripts.docs:build: dumi build  &&  rm -rf  docker/public && cp -rf ./docs-dist  docker/public
scripts.deploy: npm update web-pdm && npm i xtend && npm i wrappy && npm run docs:build && npm run publish-server && npm run build-remote

author: 北名
